text: Kronach is a Landkreis (district) in Bavaria, Germany. A large part of the district is part of the Franconian Forest nature park. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Municipalities #Kronach #Ludwigsstadt #Teuschnitz #Wallenfels #Küps #Marktrodach #Mitwitz #Nordhalben #Pressig #Reichenbach #Schneckenlohe 8. Steinbach am Wald 9. Steinwiesen 10. Stockheim 11. Tettau 12. Tschirn 13. Weißenbrunn 14. Wilhelmsthal ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website (German) Category:Districts of Bavaria
